forbidden.title: Access denied
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this resource.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

validation.title: Validation error
validation.description: Please check your input and try again.

rateLimit.title: Too many requests
rateLimit.description: You've made too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.

transaction.title: Transaction failed
transaction.description: The transaction could not be completed. Please try again.

timeout.title: Request timeout
timeout.description: The request took too long to complete. Please try again.

portal.title: Portal error
portal.description: There was an error connecting to the portal service.

internal.title: Internal server error
internal.description: The server encountered an error. Please try again later.

blockchain.title: Blockchain error
blockchain.description: There was an error interacting with the blockchain.

insufficientFunds.title: Insufficient funds
insufficientFunds.description: Your account does not have enough funds to complete this operation.

network.title: Network error
network.description: Unable to connect to the network. Please check your connection.

badRequest.title: Bad request
badRequest.description: The request was invalid or cannot be processed.

conflict.title: Conflict error
conflict.description: The request conflicts with the current state.

badGateway.title: Bad gateway
badGateway.description: The server received an invalid response. Please try again.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service unavailable
serviceUnavailable.description: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

gatewayTimeout.title: Gateway timeout
gatewayTimeout.description: The server did not respond in time. Please try again.

generic.title: Unexpected error
generic.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

notOnboarded.title: Onboarding required
notOnboarded.description: Please complete the onboarding process to continue.

systemNotCreated.title: System not initialized
systemNotCreated.description: The system has not been initialized. Please contact an administrator.

resourceAlreadyExists.title: Resource already exists
resourceAlreadyExists.description: The resource you're trying to create already exists.
